subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: With Philipp Grubauer in goal for Washington in place of Braden Holtby, who is ill, the Capitals evened their Stanley Cup playoff series with New York.
snippet: With Philipp Grubauer in goal for Washington in place of Braden Holtby, who is ill, the Capitals evened their Stanley Cup playoff series with New York.
